edu.uga.cs.rentaride.entity

Interface Reservation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface Reservation
extends Persistable
    This class represents a reservation made by a Rent-A-Ride customer, for a vehicle type at a specific rental location to be rented at a specific date and time. The requested duration of a rental must be expressed as a positive number of hours, which is less than or equal to 72. Once the customer actually rents a vehicle, the reservation will involve a rental object.
